mdufa 0.3.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Aggregate IVD Divisions to OHT7

    aggregate_ivd_to_oht7.Rd

    Combines DCTD, DIHD, DMD, DMGP division data into OHT7 organization. Different metrics are aggregated differently:

    • Count metrics: summed

    • Average metrics: weighted average by decision count

    • Percent metrics: recalculated from aggregated counts

    • Percentile metrics: excluded (cannot be aggregated without raw data)

    aggregate_ivd_to_oht7(data)

    Arguments

    data

    MDUFA III dataset (typically mdufa3)

    Value

    Dataset with IVD divisions aggregated to OHT7

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
mdufa3 |>
  filter(organization %in% c("DCTD", "DIHD", "DMD", "DMGP")) |>
  aggregate_ivd_to_oht7() |>
  filter(table_number == "2.1") |>
  head()
#> # A tibble: 6 × 14
#>   source         page  table_number organization program table_title metric_type
#>   <chr>          <chr> <chr>        <chr>        <chr>   <chr>       <chr>      
#> 1 (Aggregated) … NA    2.1          OHT7         PMA     PMA 180 Da… integer    
#> 2 (Aggregated) … NA    2.1          OHT7         PMA     PMA 180 Da… integer    
#> 3 (Aggregated) … NA    2.1          OHT7         PMA     PMA 180 Da… integer    
#> 4 (Aggregated) … NA    2.1          OHT7         PMA     PMA 180 Da… integer    
#> 5 (Aggregated) … NA    2.1          OHT7         PMA     PMA 180 Da… integer    
#> 6 (Aggregated) … NA    2.1          OHT7         PMA     PMA 180 Da… integer
